items.title: Demb√©l√© gaf Luis Enrique wat hij van Mbapp√© niet kon krijgen
items.summary: Voor Luis Enrique is 2025 een jaar geworden om nooit te vergeten. Hij liet Paris Saint-Germain uitgroeien tot een volmaakte wervelwind, met het winnen van de Champions League als het grote hoogtepunt. Dat hij niet langer te maken had met een echte superster, maakte zijn leven als trainer een stuk makkelijker.

items.title: Transferdeadlines Eredivisie en topcompetities: wanneer opent en sluit de markt?
items.summary: Het seizoen is halverwege en dat houdt in dat clubs de kans krijgen om tussentijds spelers te kopen en/of verkopen. De transferwindow opent begin januari 2026 en duurt een maand. Een overzicht van de transferwindows in de Eredivisie, Premier League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga en Ligue 1.

items.summary: Anis Hadj Moussa heeft zichzelf woensdag in de kijker gespeeld op het toernooi om de Afrika Cup. De rechtsbuiten van Feyenoord was namens het al gekwalificeerde Algerije met twee assists belangrijk in het afsluitende groepsduel met Equatoriaal-Guinea.

items.title: Maresca in danger of losing Chelsea job if results do not improve in January
items.summary: Enzo Maresca will have to improve results at Chelsea quickly if he wants to keep his job after a run of one win in seven Premier League games.

H√∏jlund joined the Serie A champions on loan last summer and the Denmark striker has scored nine goals in 20 appearances, including a double in Sunday‚Äôs 2-0 win at Cremonese. items.title: 'Are you sure?' - Guardiola questions two-horse race

items.title: Slot sees positives as Frimpong and Kerkez adapt to end of a full-back era
items.summary: Liverpool head coach‚Äôs new full-backs have struggled Slot expects improvement as squad and signings settle Arne Slot has said Liverpool remain ‚Äúa work in progress‚Äù in both full-back positions but backed Jeremie Frimpong and Milos Kerkez to make their mark as his team stabilise. Slot admits Liverpool are still adjusting to the end of the Trent Alexander-Arnold and Andy Robertson era with injuries and disruption limiting the impact of their designated successors, including Conor Bradley. Frimpong has improved since returning from his second hamstring injury of the season, however, and provided assists for Hugo Ekitik√© and Ryan Gravenberch in the recent victories over Tottenham and Wolves. Slot believes the summer signings Frimpong and Kerkez, from Bayer Leverkusen and Bournemouth respectively, will prove valuable assets for Liverpool, with their pace essential for the modern game. items.title: Masters Snooker 2026: Draw and schedule as Murphy aims to defend title

items.title: Martin √òdegaard rediscovers his missing rhythm to dictate Arsenal‚Äôs tempo again
items.summary: Rejuvenated by his goal on Saturday and free from injuries that have disrupted his season, Arsenal‚Äôs captain led their destruction of Villa When Arsenal really needed Martin √òdegaard, the captain finally rediscovered his magic touch. Gabriel Magalh√£es had just opened the scoring against Aston Villa after a first half in which Mikel Arteta‚Äôs nervous side were struggling without the influential Declan Rice. Then it happened. Jadon Sancho was waiting to receive a pass from Youri Tielemans inside Villa‚Äôs half but, before the forward knew it, √òdegaard had pinched the ball and was haring towards Emiliano Mart√≠nez‚Äôs goal. A jink back on to his left foot fooled Tielemans and allowed √òdegaard to play the perfect through ball for Mart√≠n Zubimendi to score the crucial second. It was the fifth goal or assist that Zubimendi has contributed since he joined in the summer ‚Äì the joint-best return of his club career ‚Äì and the Spaniard‚Äôs impact was rightly hailed by a delighted Arteta. ‚ÄúCredit to his teammates as well, how easy they make it for him,‚Äù said the Arsenal manager in a nod to √òdegaard.
